thread.title: Superb room and location, fair price
thread.title_full: Superb room and location, fair price - Review of AKA Central Park, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: JBeechLBNY
title: Superb room and location, fair price
text: Booked this through Expedia some months' ago. Room was large, high end modern, everything was super clean and in great shape. Had views out to street, as well as an outdoor space (too cold to use). Lobby and hallways and elevator were hip and in great shape. Very comfortable bed.
